title: Enforcer Club

Sometimes the blunt application of fear (and, admittedly, some swinging elbows) is the difference between continued chaos and the re- establishment of order.

Enforcer Club is one of the Club Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Enforcer Club is an enchanted weapon that only deals non-lethal damage, ideal for taking out enemies without killing them.
